Very convenient near the Barceloneta metro.  I came here with my Local friend, and we ordered the namesake burger, which was tender and delicious, worthy of burger eaters anywhere.  They also had some great home-brewed beers and a good beer cocktail selection.  My friend had the Smoking Hops and thoroughly enjoyed it.Didn't try the Asian side of the Asian American menu, but highly recommend for burgers and beers!
